query: SELECT DISTINCT staffName, COUNT(*) as cnt, MONTH(orderDate) as mon FROM sales WHERE saleType = 'pos' AND staffName LIKE '%Maggie%' GROUP BY staffName, MONTH(orderDate) ORDER BY staffName, mon;
